title: Scars and Stripes
description: The Last Good An Original Sinners novella told in five parts.Part Scars and StripesIt's lust at first sight when Mistress Nora encounters a sexy newcomer to The 8th Circle. She's happy for the distraction, since she left her lover, Soren, but her session with Lance is cut short when her boss, Kingsley Edge, reveals they're all in danger....
author: Tiffany Reisz
